question.long: Does processed meat consumption increase the risk of developing cancer?

description: Results from studies evaluating the impact of processed meat consumption on the risk of developing cancer.

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the effects of processed meat on cancer

no.description: The literature suggests that processed meat does not cause cancer

towards_no.description: The literature suggests that processed meat probably doesn't cause cancer, but more research is needed

towards_yes.description: The literature suggests that processed meat may cause cancer, but more research is needed

yes.description: The literature suggests that processed meat causes cancer

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of the processed meat evaluated on the risk of developing cancer

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant effect of the processed meat evaluated on the risk of developing cancer, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_but_mixed_results.description: The results of the paper show no significant overall effect of the processed meat evaluated on the risk of developing cancer, but there are mixed results on specific cases

maybe.description: The results of the paper suggest that the processed meat evaluated might have an effect on the risk of developing cancer, but the evidence is not strong enough to conclude

yes_but_low_confidence.description: The results of the paper suggest that the processed meat evaluated may increase the risk of developing cancer, but the evidence is not strong

yes_but_small_effect.description: The results of the paper suggest that the processed meat evaluated may have a small effect on the risk of developing cancer

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that the processed meat evaluated may increase the risk of developing cancer, unlike what is reported in the literature

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that the processed meat evaluated increases the risk of developing cancer
